item.title: ADOBE INC 10-K
item.description: ADOBE INC, which is in the Services-Prepackaged Software [7372] industry, SEC 10-K filing on January 17, 2023 had 35026 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: adobe - 371 instances 2022 - 275 instances financial - 248 instances revenue - 238 instances services - 237 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
